name: The Gun of Time
description:
This is the gun of time!

Made for Kenney Jam 2018 using only Kenney's assets. It is a nice concept, far from complete.

WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot. Use right mouse button to switch between future and past mode. Future mode sends aliens into the future, past mode sends them where they have been. Adjust weapon strength (how many seconds) with mouse wheel.
